prompt: Generate diverse and realistic customer feedback text that expresses negative sentiment. The feedback should convey dissatisfaction, frustration, or disappointment with a product, service, or experience. Include a wide range of contexts such as online shopping, restaurant visits, customer support interactions, app usage, travel experiences, or subscription services. Use varied tones (e.g., angry, sarcastic, disappointed, formal, passive-aggressive) and lengths (from short complaints to detailed critical reviews). Incorporate different perspectives, such as feedback from younger or older customers, or from different cultural backgrounds. Include subtle or nuanced negativity (e.g., mild frustration or polite criticism) alongside strong complaints. Examples could include criticism of poor quality, delays, unhelpful staff, technical issues, misleading advertising, or unpleasant experiences.
response:
The shirt I received was nothing like the picture; very disappointed.  
My dinner arrived cold and the service was painfully slow.  
After waiting an hour for my order, I was told they ran out of my dish.  
This app crashes every time I try to use it; absolutely frustrating.  
I felt ignored by the staff; they never came back to check on us.  
The subscription promised benefits that never materialized; very misleading.  
I can’t believe how difficult it was to get help from customer service.  
The hotel was nothing like the photos; it felt very misleading.  
I ordered a large pizza but got a tiny one; what a joke!  
The flight was delayed three times, and no one gave us updates.  
I was charged for a service I didn’t receive; this is unacceptable.  
The quality of the product was terrible; I expected much better.  
I can’t believe how rude the waiter was; it ruined our evening.  
The directions in the app were completely wrong; wasted so much time.  
The delivery was late, and when it arrived, half of it was missing.  
I tried to cancel my order, but it took forever to reach someone.  
The food was bland and overpriced; I won’t be coming back.  
I was locked out of my account for no reason; very frustrating experience.  
The staff seemed uninterested in helping; felt very unwelcoming.  
I was misled by the advertisement; the product doesn’t do what it claims.  
The checkout process was confusing and took way too long.  
I found a hair in my meal; that’s just unacceptable.  
The website is so slow; it took me ages to place my order.  
I expected better customer support; they were completely unhelpful.  
The car rental was dirty and not well maintained; very disappointing.  
I ordered a gift, and it arrived late; it ruined the surprise.  
The service was so poor, it overshadowed the good food.  
I received the wrong item, and it took forever to get a refund.  
The tour guide seemed uninterested and rushed through everything.  
I was really looking forward to the event, but it was poorly organized.  
The app keeps crashing, making it nearly impossible to use.  
I felt like I was a burden when asking for help; very frustrating.  
The restaurant was too noisy, making it hard to enjoy our meal.  
The product broke after just one use; not worth the money.  
I was charged extra fees that were not disclosed; very sneaky.  
The staff seemed overwhelmed and couldn’t provide decent service.  
I had to wait ages for my luggage; this experience was terrible.  
The online class didn’t meet my expectations; it felt rushed.  
I was promised a refund, but it still hasn't been processed.  
The delivery driver was rude and unprofessional; quite shocking.  
The food was served lukewarm; very disappointing for the price.  
I had a terrible experience with the customer support team; they were dismissive.  
The app has so many bugs; it’s practically unusable.  
I received no confirmation of my order; now I’m left wondering.  
The ambiance was nice, but the service ruined the evening.  
The furniture arrived damaged, and customer service was unhelpful.  
I expected faster service for a place that wasn’t busy.  
The website is full of errors, making it hard to shop.  
I didn’t receive what I ordered, and now I can't get a hold of anyone.  
The product was advertised as a premium item, but it feels cheap.  
The hotel staff were rude when we asked for assistance.  
I was charged for an upgrade I didn’t request; very frustrating.  
The food was overpriced and tasted bland; I won’t be coming back.
